text: Hello, our company is looking for assistance updating images on our website using coding. Is anyone familiar with coding and or can you point me to someone who is please? Thank you!

Good Morning | Afternoon | Evening :wave:

I'm seeking developers to chat about their *local dev experience and usage*. This will be an exploratory call, so there is nothing to prep ahead of time. I'm also not looking for any specific usage of local dev; it can be building UI extensions, themes, modules, etc.. If you use local dev, I want to chat with you.

You can <https://meetings.HubSpot.com/ciannone|find time on my calendar> if you're up for a chat. :alert:
Hey <@U07BF4NAWF9>, what do you mean by "updating images on our website using coding"? Do you mean change a batch of images by API or creating new modules/optimizing existing ones for image usage?
